subject: Question about baseplate
description_text:
Hello,

I've been looking at your pedals and I'd want the 3 pedal set for sure. I'm
currently using this wheel stand with a G920, Amazon.com: GTPLAYER Sim
Racing Wheel Stand Simulator Cockpit Wheel Stand Racing Steering Shifter
Mount fit for Logitech G25 G27 G29 G920 G923 Thrustmaster T330TS Gaming
Stand Wheel Pedals NOT Included, Black : Video Games
<https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C7VQ8P8M?th=1>. I can already see that I
couldn't mount 3 pedals on this without the baseplate.. but my question is,
does your baseplate pattern match any of those listed that my universal
wheel stand can accommodate?

Thank you for your consideration,
Donnie

conversations.body_text: Hi Donnie Shiel,     Here are the base dimensions of the two pedal models for your reference.

It looks like it will fit so I went ahead and ordered it. Its already
shipped so I'm really looking forward to trying it out as my first big
upgrade. Any idea when you plan to release your wheelbase?

Thanks,
Donnie

On Sat, Nov 1, 2025 at 8:34 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Donnie Shiel,    We plan to release our wheelbase in December.
